a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(min(b // a, c))


a,b,c = map(int,input().split())
print(min(b//a,c))

A,B,C = map(int, input().split())
print(min(C, B // A))


n, a, b = map(int, input().split())

if n % (a + b) == 0:
    print(n // (a + b) * a)
else:
    print(n // (a + b) * a + min(n % (a + b), a))

A, B, C = map(int, input().split())

count = 0
while B >= A and count <= C:
    B -= A
    count += 1
print(count)

a,b,c = map(int, input().split())

count = 0
while b >= a and count <= c:
    b -= a
    count += 1
print(count)
